body_html: @gautamsreekumar tf.contrib.image.translate has the same issue as tf.contrib.image.transform since the gradient for bilinear interpolation can't be calculated from the existing projective transformation. OpenCV or MATLAB would be a better option.
body_text: @gautamsreekumar tf.contrib.image.translate has the same issue as tf.contrib.image.transform since the gradient for bilinear interpolation can't be calculated from the existing projective transformation. OpenCV or MATLAB would be a better option.
body: @gautamsreekumar `tf.contrib.image.translate` has the same issue as `tf.contrib.image.transform` since the gradient for bilinear interpolation can't be calculated from the existing projective transformation. OpenCV or MATLAB would be a better option.
